title: Fun Movies Coming in 2026
summary: In 2026, many exciting movies will be released that could help movie theaters get more people to watch films, just like when Barbie and Oppenheimer came out in 2023. Some big movies include a new Spider-Man with Tom Holland, a second Super Mario Brothers film, and a sequel to The Devil Wears Prada. There are also movies based on books, like Hamnet about Shakespeare's life, and scary movies like a new Scream. Other films include Wuthering Heights, a love story, and a comedy called Is This Thing On? The article lists 20 movies to look forward to, hoping they will make the movie industry very busy and successful after some quiet years.

Some movies are based on books or real people, and others are new stories. The goal is to get more people excited about going to the movies after some slow years.
